title: Hon
resume: Soul is a 2009 South Korean crime horror television drama series, starring Im Joo-eun and Lee Seo-jin. It is about a high school girl possessed by spirits and the criminal profiler who exploits her powers in his quest for justice, played by Im and Lee respectively. It aired on Munhwa Broadcasting Corporation from August 5 to September 3, 2009 on Wednesdays and Thursdays at 21:55 for 10 episodes.
